text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a SecurityPolicy

name: SecurityPolicy
title: SecurityPolicy
description:
Types of security policies that further specify the ActClassPolicy value set.

**Examples:**

 *  encrypt
 *  prohibit redisclosure without consent directive
